announcement.goals.undercover: You don't have a Mood, and Killers will mistake you for their ally.
announcement.goals.conductor: Use the master key to open up every door on the train!
announcement.role.the_insane_damned_para: The Insane Damned Paranoid Killer Of Doom Death Destruction And Waffles
announcement.goals.time_keeper: You can see how much time is left of the round.
announcement.goals.bartender: See players that drink through walls!
announcement.goals.phantom: Turn invisible; but watch out for collisions.
announcement.goals.noisemaker: Alert players of your location upon death.
announcement.goals.voodoo: Choose another player to go down with you.
hud.voodoo.natural_death_disabled: Voodoo deaths must be triggered by another player!
announcement.goals.recaller: Teleport to anywhere on the train!
announcement.goals.vulture: Eat half of the players' bodies to win!
item.noellesroles.ingredient.tooltip: Right-click on a base spirit to mix in
item.noellesroles.defense_vial.tooltip:
Right click on drink trays to use
Clears all poison applied to trays
Protects anyone who drinks a defensed drink one extra hit of life.
tip.morphling.corpse_active: Corpse mode active (Press G to disable)
announcement.goals.jester: Get killed by an innocent to win!
announcement.goals.corrupt_cop: Kill everyone to win! While you're alive, neither killers nor passengers can win.
game.win.corrupt_cop: Justice has been served... my way.
announcement.goals.bomber: Plant bombs on players! You cannot buy knife or gun. You can see players carrying your timed bomb through walls.
item.noellesroles.timed_bomb.tooltip:
Right click on a player to plant
After 10s, bomb starts beeping
Can be passed to other players (3s cooldown)
Explodes after 15s of beeping
announcement.goals.assassin: Use your keen eye to expose players' true identities! Right guess—BANG! Wrong guess—also BANG! (Vigilante's too smart to fool)
screen.assassin.title: Assassin Menu
tip.assassin.guess_correct: Bingo! You saw right through %s—they're down!
tip.assassin.guess_wrong: Oops! %s isn't what you thought... BANG! Overconfidence has its price.
announcement.goals.scavenger: Cover your tracks! Bodies you create are invisible to most. Bonus: Extra cash per kill, knife-only arsenal, and a 100-coin CD reset option.
item.noellesroles.scavenger_reset_knife_:
Costs 100 coins
Instantly resets your knife cooldown
tip.scavenger.not_enough_money: Need 100 coins to reset knife CD!
tip.corrupt_cop.moment_triggered: Corrupt Cop Moment activated! Gun cooldown reduced, crowbar obtained!
subtitle.noellesroles.corrupt_cop_moment: The Corrupt Cop has cleared enough people. He initiates the final gambit against the survivors.
item.noellesroles.corrupt_cop_crowbar.to:
Corrupt Cop Moment exclusive
Can open all doors
announcement.goals.reporter: Mark a player to see them through walls!
announcement.goals.serial_killer: Hunt and kill your target! Target automatically changes on death. Extra money for kills on your target!
item.noellesroles.timekeeper_reduce_time:
Costs 100 coins
Reduces game time by 30 seconds
announcement.goals.attendant: Check your passenger manifest to see who's in each room!
announcement.goals.toxicologist: You can see who is poisoned.
item.noellesroles.antidote.tooltip:
Use on a poisoned player to cure them
Requires 1.5s charge time
5 minute cooldown after use
announcement.goals.taotie: Swallow all players or survive 2 minutes during Taotie Moment to win!
game.win.taotie: The endless hunger has finally been satisfied.
subtitle.noellesroles.taotie_moment: The endless hunger will devour everything
tip.noellesroles.taotie_moment_countdown: Find and kill Taotie! Time remaining: %s seconds
subtitle.noellesroles.jester_moment: When justice begins to mock itself...
announcement.goals.silencer: Shut them up! Silenced targets can't speak, hear others, eat food, drink cocktails, and their SAN drains faster.
tip.silencer.ready: Ability ready! Aim at target and press [%s] to mark
tip.silencer.marked: Marked %s, press again within 30s to silence
tip.silenced.cannot_eat: You are silenced and cannot eat!
tip.silenced.cannot_drink: You are silenced and cannot drink!
announcement.goals.bodyguard: Protect the Serial Killer's target! Stay within 3 blocks to sacrifice yourself and save them.
death_reason.noellesroles.bodyguard_sacr: sacrificed themselves to protect their target.
announcement.goals.poisoner: Use poison needles and gas bombs to poison your enemies! You can also use poison vials and scorpions.
item.noellesroles.poison_needle.tooltip:
Right-click a player to inject poison
1 minute initial cooldown, 45s cooldown after use
Reusable
item.noellesroles.poison_gas_bomb.toolti:
Right-click to throw a gas bomb
Releases gas that spreads through open spaces
Gas cannot pass through blocks
Staying in gas for 5s causes poisoning
Gas dissipates after 30s
item.noellesroles.catalyst.tooltip:
Use on a poisoned player: death in 5s
Also resets Poison Needle cooldown
Using on air or non-poisoned only resets cooldown
replay.poisoned.noellesroles.needle.by: %s was poisoned by %s with a §5poison needle§r
announcement.goals.bandit: Use throwing axes to kill from range! Hold longer for further throws, penetrates through players!
item.noellesroles.throwing_axe.tooltip:
Hold right-click to charge, release to throw
Longer charge = further distance
Penetrates through multiple players, instant kill
announcement.goals.survival_master: You are invisible to killer instinct! When conditions are met, Survival Moment activates — survive 120 seconds to win!
tip.survival_master.moment_active: Survival Moment! Hold on! %s seconds remaining
subtitle.noellesroles.survival_moment: The Survival Master has vanished into the shadows. Killers must find them before time runs out.
tip.noellesroles.survival_moment_countdo: Find and kill the Survival Master! Time remaining: %s seconds
replay.death_blocked.survival_moment: %s was immune to assassination during §dSurvival Moment§r
